# The Ace Tomato Company

> Fresh Software, Delivered On Target

## About

The Ace Tomato Company builds custom SaaS platforms that solve real business problems. We focus on delivering production-ready applications with modern technology stacks, clean architecture, and exceptional user experiences.

We help businesses grow by solving big challenges on modest budgets. Custom software delivered in weeks or months, not years.

## Services

- Custom SaaS Platform Development
- AI Integration and Implementation
- Real-time Data Systems
- Web Application Development
- Full-stack Software Consulting

## Portfolio

### FedFusion.ai
AI-powered government contractor marketplace connecting buyers with verified vendors through intelligent RFP response generation.
- RAG-based RFP response generation with vector embeddings
- Multi-stage AI pipeline for content generation and compliance
- SAM.gov and USASpending.gov API integration
- Tech Stack: Next.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Supabase, pgvector, Cohere

### Sector1.ai
Professional motorsports live timing and telemetry platform with real-time race monitoring and data persistence.
- Real-time data synchronization at 5Hz with sub-200ms latency
- D3.js-powered track visualization with live car positioning
- Tech Stack: React, TypeScript, D3.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, WebSocket

### Splitout.ai
Interactive AI-powered resume platform that answers questions about professional experience in real-time.
- RAG-based document retrieval with vector embeddings
- Automated resume/document ingestion pipeline
- Tech Stack: React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Supabase, OpenAI, Cohere

### Middleseat.app
Smart travel optimization platform that finds the optimal meeting location by analyzing flight prices across multiple origin cities.
- AI-powered natural language destination matching
- Real-time price analysis across 47 US cities
- Tech Stack: Next.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Supabase, OpenAI

### Automated Service Quote Generation
AI-assisted quote generation system that combines customer requirements with product catalog data to produce professional proposals.
- AI-powered quote generation with product catalog integration
- Dynamic pricing rules with urgency-based adjustments
- Tech Stack: Next.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Supabase, OpenAI GPT-4
